title: Using AWS Lambda with Amazon Kinesis with Batch Item Handling.
description: Using AWS Lambda with Amazon Kinesis with Batch Item Handling.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The Lambda function retrieves Kinesis Records from the event parameter that it receives. The function retrieves Kinesis payload, decode from Base64 and log them to cloudwatch. The function reports batchItemFailures with SequenceNumber, in order for this feature to work ReportBatchItemFailures should be enabled in lambda configurations
